puzzle_1.clue_1.page_1:
PUZZLE #1 CLUE #1/5

Dear Player.

The person I am working with keeps calling me William Shakespeare because of my atrocious English during conversations.
puzzle_1.clue_1.page_2: Since I know what the second clue is, I'm going to give you simple directions to lead you to it.
puzzle_1.clue_1.page_3:
The x-coordinate of your player position should be the number -14141, and the z-coordinate of your player position should be the number 28382.

Most annoyingly, Shakespearian English Translator.
